participant_1.background:
I took a long, hot bath at the beach on my last vacation.
I am a gummy worm maker, and I love my job!
i like to make clothes.
I love to drive, but if I were blind, I could not do that.
i recently had knee surgery.

participant_2.background:
My worst fear is that I will lose my sense of humor.
I remember the hours I spent practicing my flute in the attic, lost in the music and my own thoughts.
my dog s name is wonwon.
I took up brewing my own beer and became a regular at local car shows with my Ford F-150.
I have a laptop that I use to do my schoolwork and write my stories.

content.text: Nice to meet you! My name is (name).
What do you do for fun?
I like to play my flute, go for drives, and brew beer.
That sounds fun! I like to cook and read. I just had knee surgery, so I'm not doing much for fun right now.
Oh no! I hope you have a speedy recovery. I also like to read. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read mystery and suspense novels. I also like to read historical fiction.
Me too! I love historical fiction. I also like to read fantasy and science fiction.
Have you ever been to the beach?
Yes, I love going to the beach! I especially love swimming in the ocean.
I love the beach too! I took a long, hot bath at the beach on my last vacation. It was amazing.
That sounds wonderful! I'm so jealous. I've been wanting to go to the beach lately.
You should go! It's so relaxing.
I will! I'm going to plan a beach trip soon.
That's great! I hope you have a great time.
